title: Ep. 64 - We're All Mentally Disordered
description:
The drug companies and the psychiatric industry have turned nearly every human emotion, trait, characteristic, and weakness into symptoms of mental diseases. Often they do so by pushing thoroughly debunked theories like "chemical imbalancement." Before long, we will all be mentally disordered.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
